title:
Parque De Campismo São Miguel

Located in the Costa Vicentina Natural Park, the campsite offers a beautiful pine forest, very quiet, ideal to spend a good time near one of the best beaches, Odeceixe, and is a strategic place if you are hiking or cycling in the region. Friendly staff and great facilities including a very nice restaurant and a great swimming pool! Pets are only allowed in the low season .

 Easy online booking

Odemira -

For campers we offer a pitch in the middle of nature on a hill in the beautiful Alentejo. It can be reached via a 5km long dirt road, which is easy to drive on when it is not raining too heavily. The site is in the shade of a beautiful cork oak and is about 500 meters from our 2 inhabited houses. We live on the property with 4 free-roaming, peaceful, bright and sociable dogs who, apart from greeting our guests, mostly stay near the house. The area offers: Odemira about 20 minutes by car, Sao Luis about 15 minutes by car, the sea about 30 minutes by car, hiking trails , access to Pego das Pias

Odemira - 13 Rua das Barreiras Vermelhas

On the banks of the Rio Mira. It's a perfectly normal and exceptionally quiet parking area where campervans are tolerated, provided they are self-sufficient! Odemira has created a beautiful spot here. Located directly on the river, with park-like grounds and sun umbrellas on the riverside lawn, it's a lovely place to relax. The new pedestrian bridge provides quick access to the town. An art exhibition on the opposite bank is one of the attractions. On a hilltop stands a 12.5m x 6m sculpture, the Monumento ao Cante Alentejano, depicting a regionally typical choir, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Bars, pubs, a supermarket, two gas stations, and several other shops complete the offerings.

Odemira - Unnamed Road

Private place with a very nice family. The pitches are simple and free to choose from. There is a shared bathing house with a shower and composting toilet. A washing up facility is also available. For the children there is a trampoline on the property and a few meters away there is a nice little playground with a small skate park. The small downtown of São Luís is 5 minutes away by bike. A bicycle can also be rented. In São Luís there are supermarkets, bakeries, a weekly market, laundromat, pharmacy and also a doctor. It's about 15 minutes by car to the sea. Please be sure to call in advance. This is a private property with no signage. It is sometimes not possible to park here, especially in winter.

Luzianes - Vale Cernes

Please call in advance! or WhatsApp. See number in the contact section. We are a German family with two children, ages 10 and 8, and we emigrated to Portugal in May 2022. We are renovating our old Portuguese mud house ourselves, using natural materials such as clay and lime. You can park and relax in a beautiful spot away from the house  surrounded by nature. A trampoline for children's fun is also available. Enjoy the relaxation and peace! Good internet connection available. Are you interested in mud construction or life in Portugal? Do you want to emigrate yourself, perhaps with children, and have questions about emigrating, buying a house, bureaucracy, etc. If time permits, we would be happy to take an hour to answer all your questions. The exchange of experiences is not included in the overnight price. Overnight stay without exchange of experiences: €10. Overnight stay with exchange of experiences: €50.  Location: In the village of Luzianes, there is a small shop for basics . There is a public shower/restroom that you can use. The Santa Clara Reservoir is great for swimming and hiking; it's about a 15-minute drive away. In Santa Clara, there is a gas station, two supermarkets, a café, and a post office. Anyone passing through with a self-sufficient vehicle is welcome, even for longer stays, by arrangement. Pets are welcome :) , but the area is not fenced. If you have any questions, just let me know ❤️ Lydia and Max

Campiférias

Place on a street, which hardly disturbs. We wanted to stay 2 nights and ended up staying 11 nights. Everything fits here, the market hall opposite the entrance, a launderette, Spar and a Portuguese supermarket 200m away. Very nice place, great cheap restaurants, very nice people everywhere. The sea is within walking distance, we had the bikes with us. Great backcountry. Sanitary older but good and clean. A plus for us, there are no dogs on the site. Value for money is good here.

Campsite Orbitur Sitava Milfontes The campsite is pleasant, offers plenty of shade and is only 600 m from the beach. It has own supermarket, snack-bar and restaurant. The campsite also has TV room, game area, tennis court, outdoor fitness circuit, children’s playground and a great swimming pool. São Teotónio -

A wonderful, sweet little country with a German-Portuguese family. Water is available, but NOT drinkable. The owners are very friendly and helpful with any questions. You can buy essentials in the nearby small town. The beaches and bays are absolutely dreamy. The owners are happy to advise you in English, German, and Portuguese. Eggs can be purchased on the farm.  We felt very comfortable and will definitely come back. There is NO hot shower, NO toilets, or waste disposal! Please use the email address to contact us. If no one is there, simply go through the gate and knock on the white glass door on the right. !!We would also like to ask those arriving with dogs to please keep their dogs on a leash!!

Welcome to Monte do Ruivo camper site! We offer a peaceful and secure space for a few campers, with basic amenities such as electricity, waste disposal, and temporary Wi-Fi available for special occasions. Our site boasts a beautiful landscape and a stunning night sky. As a former camper driver, I understand the importance of a secure and restful place to stay. We're working on adding more amenities for future campers to enhance your experience. Please respect the natural surroundings. In case you have dog please keep him on a leash during your stay. For now we only allow max 3 nights. Enjoy your visit, and we look forward to seeing you soon!

Quinta do Rossi - Caravan Park

Welcome to Quinta do Rossi! We have a small caravan park where you can use our services such as electricity, toilets with hot shower, water points, lounges and common room with washing machine, tables, sinks, fridge, microwave and wifi for free. You can also find fresh organic products - wine, olive oil - and fresh seasonal vegetables for sale. Animals are allowed for an additional fee . The beach is 5 minutes by car and 40 minutes on foot. Check out our profile for more information. See you soon! | WE DO NOT RESERVE IN ORDER OF ARRIVAL. PARK OPENING HOURS: 9am to 9pm. Checkin after 9pm possible by registering at the gate. Costs 10 euros extra!

Monte Parreira

Advance reservation required. We look forward to welcoming you to Monte Parreira. Monte Parreira is a high-altitude property near São Teotónio with wonderful views over part of the Alentejo. We are happy to provide one or two overnight pitches free of charge. Access is no problem for four-wheel drive vehicles; others need sufficient weight on the drive axle to negotiate the steeper sections of the approach without difficulty. The view makes up for this. We speak German, English, Spanish, Portuguese, Greek, and Italian.

Monte Cruz

We offer a pitch with water & electricity and the magnificent view of the rolling hills of the Alentejo and the lake of Monte Cruz. A natural paradise is being created on 4.5 hectares of land, which is filled with a lot dedication to saving our precious commodity water and reforestation. If you are interested in learning more about the project, life in Portugal and the cycles of nature, then you are welcome to combine your stay with a Monte Tour. The access to the property includes a dirt road of about 800 m. Further services: Monte Tour 3-4 h with snacks and drinks Massage 30mins/60mins/90mins Please call before arrival or contact us via Whatsapp by phone or email If you have any questions, please write a short message. Looking forward to your stay :)

Monte Huam Hu

Imagine waking up to the fresh morning air, surrounded by lush greenery as far as the eye can see. You step out of your motorhome and enjoy the breathtaking view of the valley - a sight so magnificent it looks like it came straight from a postcard. Welcome to Monte Huam Hu, a campsite that offers not only a place to park your motorhome, but an experience that will amaze you. The space may be simple, but it offers everything you need for a comfortable stay. From water  to electricity and WiFi access just steps away, you don't have to worry about anything other than immersing yourself in the beauty that surrounds you. Take a walk through the valley and explore the nearby hills. Find the perfect spot to lie in a hammock in the shade and enjoy the peace that nature offers. With plenty of areas to sit and relax, you'll never tire of taking in the breathtaking views. Since there is no air pollution in Monte Huam Hu, the night sky is truly a breathtaking sight. Make Monte Huam Hu your second home and escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life. This is where peace lives and memories are created. Don't miss this incredible opportunity to discover one of nature's true wonders! The site does not offer landfill. Solar power is only available during the day. Please contact us before your visit!

Casas novas da Palmeira

Our farm is located in the Portuguese "Outback", on a plateau with beautiful views. On the one side you can see the mountain of the Monchique and on the other side the ocean If you love nature and animals pure clean air you've come to the right place. Perfect for unwinding and relaxing. Take a swim in the lake or hang around the Poolhouse  with hammacks, table tennis, outdoor kitchen, darts, bbq, wifi and workspace. At night you only hear the calls of foxes, owls and nightingales. The closest beach is 25 minutes away.  The closest bigger town is Sao Teotonio, about 20 minutes by car. If you like to come please just send a message to my whatsapp number. Thank you so much and see you soon:) ate ja ) through the forest with lots of wholes ! If I dont answer self check in possible. Just drive until the table tennis.  park there and discover by foot where is the best for you to park.

NM - Natured Minds

Warm welcome to Quinta NM  A natureful farm stay for you who long to retreat into nature and experience off-grid living. Nestled in the mountains above Odeceixe, close to Aljezur, Monchique and São Teótonio, our space offers refreshing lake swims and gravelled pitches overlooking the wild coast of the Costa Vicentina Natural Park. Whether you’re looking for an overnight stay or a deeper pause in nature, you are warmly welcome to land, ground, and rediscover your connection with the natural world. A vast land of biodiversity awaits you – among cork oaks, wild olive trees, rock roses, pine trees and fruit tree orchards. You can park next to our lake and ground yourself on your private earth terrace, or choose our mountain plateau – both with breathtaking sea views on a clear day. Fall asleep to frog lullabies, awake to birdsong, enjoy free access to fresh water and seasonal greens, play and relax by the lake beach of your choice, unwind in the chill out forest, and watch the sunset on your terrace. We are gently developing a regenerative living space based on permaculture – a place to reconnect people with nature for both human and planetary well-being. Your stay supports this vision and invites you to nature your mind to nurture your soul. ⸻ What we offer: • Panoramic sea and mountain views • Accessible parking on our mountain plateau or next to our grounding earth terraces and ruin facilities  • Access to fresh water • Shaded outdoor living room • Forest chill-out area • A freshwater lake • Recycling and compost station • Fire-free safety zone • Pets welcome  ⸻ Stay details: • Contact us beforehand to reserve your spot and to receive route recommendations. Please note that the gps doesn’t always show the best road. From the north and west the best road is through the north entry of São Teotónio. From the south the best is through Aljezur in direction to Marmelete - Selão - São Teotónio. From the east through Marmelete towards São Teotónio.

Green Oaks Alentejo

We are a family of six and offer quiet accommodation in a cosy valley on our property. You are surrounded by wild nature and have a phenomenal view of the night sky. The pitches have direct access to the bathing area on the lake. A solar shower, a composting toilet and a sink are located at the new, central bathhouse, where you can also find a clay-built barbecue. Running water is freely available on all pitches. At the farm, which is about 500 m away, there are goats  to pet, cats, a dog, sheep, chickens, chicks and a small farm shop. You can arrive with a camper, caravan or tent. Our farm is about 10 minutes from Ourique and the IC1, or 15 minutes from the motorway. Please let us know before you come and we will send you the directions. Inquiries are best made via Whatsapp or Telegram. Families with children and dogs are very welcome. Children and dogs are free of charge. Reduced rates for long-term stays. We are also Workaway / Wwoofing hosts.

Garvão -

Nestled in Portugal’s Alentejo countryside, our stopover offers a breathtaking escape surrounded by cork oaks, holm oaks, and native trees. As the sun sets, the sky bursts into vibrant hues, and at night, you’ll be captivated by the vast canopy of stars. Perfect for those seeking the raw beauty of nature, it’s a peaceful retreat filled with birdsong and the gentle sounds of grazing sheep. Though secluded, it’s conveniently close to a local village, with the sea coast just 50 minutes away, the Algarve within an hour, and Lisbon within two hours. Please check for availability beforehand. ☺️

Craveiras -

Welcome to Pereiras-Gare! I offer a Park4night spot for one camper  with a beautiful view overlooking the landscape with Cork Oaks and Strawberry trees . Enjoy the solitude surrounded by nature. Out of sight behind a crest you will find my garden and chickens and an old ruin that I am working on. Feel free to bring your dog, mine are very playful. I have a limited water supply for myself, but if you need 20l, just ask. You can also refill water in Santa Clara or Sao Marcos, only 15min drive from Pereiras. These little villages have nice restaurants too. In Pereiras, a 15 minutes walk away, you will encounter two small shops and two cafés. Please give me a call to find out the easiest access to the spot.
